Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, but recognizing its importance to you, I aim to make it accessible. I propose a price of $10,000 for this product, believing it strikes a fair balance between its worth to us and its value to you. I trust this offer will allow us to come to an agreement that benefits both parties. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
